content:
260 UK Judge rules that criticism of goatfuckers is allowed. posted 4 days ago by _Liberty_Prime_ 5 comments award share report block Bernie @Artemisfornow • 4d 🚨 Well now … A UK judge has ruled that “Islam-critical” beliefs ARE protected under the Equality Act 2010 Previous claimants had been told such views were not “worthy of respect in a democracy”. The governments definition of Islamaphobia will be a bit tricky now.
